cards.title: Phase
setup: At the start of the game, put {Phase}'s villain character cards into play, “Intagible Saboteur“ side up.
Search the villain deck for the card Reinforced Wall and put it into play. Shuffle the villain deck.
gameplay: At the start of the villain turn, if there are 3 or more obstacles in play, flip {Phase}'s villain character cards.
Increase damage dealt by {Phase} by 1 for each obstacle that has been removed from the game.
Phase is immune to damage dealt by environment cards.
At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
cards.advanced: When {Phase} is damaged, she becomes immune to damage until the end of the turn.
flippedGameplay: When {Phase} flips to this side, destroy the obstacle with the lowest HP and remove it from the game. If the card Insubstantial Matador is in play, destroy it.
At the end of the villain turn, {Phase} deals each hero target {H} radiant damage. Then, flip {Phase}'s villain character cards.
cards.flippedAdvanced: When {Phase} flips to this side, destroy {H - 2} hero ongoing cards.

openingLines.default: Ha! Smell ya later, losers! This girl is outta here!

cards.title: Almost got her!
body: Increase damage dealt to Obstacles by 1 by the first hero target damaged by {Phase} each round.
Damage dealt by {Phase} is irreducible.
At the start of the villain turn, if there are 1 or 0 Obstacles in play, each player must discard a card. Then, this card is destroyed.
cards.flavorText: His hand made contact just as{BR}the saboteur began to shimmer, and{BR}Impact found himself sinking through the{BR}wall along with her.

cards.title: Around the corner
cards.body: The first time an Obstacle is destroyed each turn, {Phase} deals each hero target 2 radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Persistence? Blind rage?{BR}I can work with these.

cards.title: Blocked sightline
body: Whenever {Phase} would be dealt damage, reduce that damage to 0.
When this card is destroyed, {Phase} deals the 2 hero targets with the highest HP {H} irreducible radiant damage each.

cards.title: Density regulator
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Phase} by 1.
At the end of the villain turn, {Phase} deals each hero target except the hero target with the lowest HP 2 radiant damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Please don't talk about the physics{BR}involved. They don't make any sense.

cards.title: Distortion grenade
body: Increase damage dealt to non-villain targets by 1.
When this card enters play, it deals the {H}-1 hero targets with the lowest HP 2 lightning damage each.

cards.title: Distortion net
body: When this card enters play, place it next to the hero with the highest HP.
Reduce damage dealt by that hero by 2.
At the start of that hero's turn, this card deals them {H} toxic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: You are...erf...exactly{BR}as heavy as you look.

cards.title: Frequency shift
body: {Phase} regains X HP, where X is the number of Obstacle cards in play.
{Phase} deals the hero target with the highest HP {H} irreducible radiant damage and destroys 1 ongoing and 1 equipment card belonging to that hero.

flavorQuotes.text: You're not even slowing me down!

cards.title: Insubstantial matador
body: When this card enters play, {Phase} deals the hero target with the second lowest HP {H - 1} radiant damage.
At the end of each hero's turn, if that hero dealt {Phase} no damage, that hero deals themselves 1 irreducible melee damage.

cards.title: Nowhere to go but down
body: Reveal cards from the top of the villain deck until {H - 1} Obstacle cards are revealed. Shuffle the other revealed cards back into the villain deck.
Put the Obstacles into play in the order they were revealed.

cards.title: Precarious rubble
body: When this card enters play, it deals the hero target with the lowest HP {H - 1} projectile damage. Then, play the top card of the villain deck.
{Phase} is immune to damage.

flavorQuotes.text: The world's full of{BR}opportunities when you're untouchable.

cards.flavorReference: Phase, Pieces of the Sky Limited Series

cards.title: Reinforced wall
body: {Phase} is immune to damage.
This card is indestructible while it has more than 0 HP.
Other Obstacles that enter play are immune to damage while this card is in play.

flavorQuotes.text: Something tripped the{BR}exterior alarms. Any sign of a breach?

cards.flavorReference: Cpt. Reager, Halcyon Crash Limited Series

cards.title: Residual desynchronization
body: Reduce damage dealt to Obstacles by 1.
The first time a villain target is dealt damage each turn, it deals the source of that damage 2 energy damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Everything she walks{BR}through is messed up.

cards.title: Unimpeded progress
body: At the end of the villain turn, play the top card of the villain deck.
Destroy this card when {Phase} is dealt 2 times {H} or more damage in 1 round.
cards.flavorReference: Phase, Pieces of the Sky Limited Series

cards.title: Vault door
body: {Phase} is immune to damage.
When this card would be dealt 2 or less damage, prevent that damage.
